typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Risk_Sub_Class as string,
		Risk_Class as string,
		Risk_Description as string,
		Actions_and_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as integer,
		Severity as integer,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as integer,
		Residual_Severity as integer,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as integer,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Process_Name as string,
		CurrentReportingPeriod as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsForDelete
SelectColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelationalDelete
